hero.description: I turn ideas into functional and elegant digital solutions. Specialized in creating modern, high-performance web experiences.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
paragraphs: Hello! I'm Gabriel, passionate about technology and creating digital solutions. With over 4 years of experience in the market, I've worked on several challenging projects that allowed me to develop technical and creative skills.

My journey began as a Backend Programmer with Springboot where I'm most familiar, after 3 years working as a backend developer, I started working with React Js. Today, I combine these two passions to create beautiful, functional interfaces with security and maintainability.
I believe technology should be accessible and intuitive. My goal is to develop solutions that simplify people's lives while providing a pleasant and memorable experience.

skills.title: My
skills.subtitle: Main technologies I master for back-end and cloud development.
